room_title: Escape room "Mysteries of the Hidden Temple" by ​Escape Bloomington in Bloomington
room_description:
Legends tell of a hidden temple deep in the jungle, left by an ancient civilization with a penchant for riddles and secrets. Your mentor, Professor Trout, has spent a lifetime researching this civilization.
Recently he discovered something huge in his research: the location of the very temple spoken of in legend! Unfortunately, with his busy schedule, he can’t visit it personally. So instead he’s sent you to
explore and to bring back the treasure of the temple: a golden idol!
Armed with his research notes, your group has entered the temple, only to find the doors slamming shut behind you! You don’t know what will happen if you can’t get out in time, but it can’t be anything
good--find the treasure and escape from the temple before time runs out!
